GoodieHutType.Name: Campfire
GoodieHutType.Description: A small campfire burns in the darkness. Approach with weapons at the ready, for the smell of charred meat makes clear that whoever built the fire remains nearby.

GoodieHutType.Name: Canvas Lean-to
GoodieHutType.Description: A canvas lean-yo stretches across a fallen tree limb. Two skinned animals - rabbits? Dogs? Infant wargs? - hang from a nearby branch. And from the other side of the hill comes the sound of footsteps rapidly approaching.

GoodieHutType.Name: Black Tent
GoodieHutType.Description: A black tent stands at the edge of a clearing, its flaps pinned open... The tent bears the forbidden sigil of the White Eye... the sigil of the Titan Curgen.

GoodieHutType.Name: Hut
GoodieHutType.Description: A simple hut of stark, unnaturally white wood stands alone in the center of an immense, lifeless clearing... footsteps lead to the hut's door, and alongside them is a dark-colored smear that may be blood.

GoodieHutType.Name: Spire
GoodieHutType.Description: A lone spire beckons in the distance. The sole standing structure, amidst a city of ruins.

GoodieHutType.Name: Campfire
GoodieHutType.Description: A campfire's light pierces the darkness. A shadowy figure kneels down, and tends to the flame... and then, somehow alerted to the presence of watching eyes, stands and draws a weapon.

GoodieHutType.Name: Tent
GoodieHutType.Description: A wayfarer's tent stands alone in a clearing. The grass nearby bears the imprint of a pair of boots.

GoodieHutType.Name: Pavillion
GoodieHutType.Description: A pavillon of richly-colored cloths, with flags of various trading houses staked out front of it, stands at the edge of a clearing, its flaps pinned open.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cabin
GoodieHutType.Description: A simple cabin sits at the edge of the wood, windowless, with a single entrance. A hitching post stands before it, alongside a simple garden. A plume of smoke rises from the chimney.

GoodieHutType.Name: Tower
GoodieHutType.Description: A tower stands tall in the midst of a ruined city. In its sole window, the silhouetted outline of a figure is visible.

GoodieHutType.Name: Thieves Den
GoodieHutType.Description: Bolts of white silk, a handful of finely woven rugs, a half-dozen leather saddles, lay scattered haphazardly on the ground. This is a bandit's camp, occupied by the clan of thieves who stole these goods... the clan Hassaini.

GoodieHutType.Name: Temple Ruins
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lie the remnants of a vast temple complex thousands of years old, sanctuaries and houses of worship once devoted to the Five - the Elemental Lords of Anthuane, whose treasures may yet remain within.

GoodieHutType.Name: Naja's Nest
GoodieHutType.Description: Home to the deadly reptiles and their egg clutches, though once, it appears, others may have called this cave home.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Village
GoodieHutType.Description: The toppled remnants of a waist-high wall of stone; the rotting ruins of long-forsaken log cabins; bits and pieces of rusted metal, broken shards of pottery...who knows what treasures may lurk within these ruins.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ancient Battlefield
GoodieHutType.Description: The site of a long-forgotten battle from the time before this one, or perhaps a more recent struggle. Bits of bone dot the ground, though whether that bone belonged to man or fallen is difficult to tell.

GoodieHutType.Name: Widow Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Spun between two dead oaks in a field of ash, a web with threads as thick as rope holds the dessicated corpse of an unfortunate traveler.

GoodieHutType.Name: Campfire
GoodieHutType.Description: A small campfire burns in the darkness. Approach with weapons at the ready, for the smell of charred meat makes clear that whoever built the fire remains nearby.

GoodieHutType.Name: Mysterious Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: Here is a rift in the side of the mountain; a cavern seemingly slashed from the rock by energies too monstrous to contemplate.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman's Tent
GoodieHutType.Description: A single figure bows low before the flickering firelight, chanting softly to himself.

GoodieHutType.Name: Tomb of the Ancients
GoodieHutType.Description: The letters carved into the face of this shattered ruin are Avostanii... the language of the Titans. They appear to warn of danger waiting within.

GoodieHutType.Name: Nobleman's Estate
GoodieHutType.Description: The house of a wealthy merchant, or perhaps a nobleman. A grand home, no doubt filled with grand treasures.

GoodieHutType.Name: Field
GoodieHutType.Description: Though there was a fire here a few years ago, the land has already begun to regrow. Wildflowers grow in small patches and the tangle of grass pulls at the feet of anyone passing through.

GoodieHutType.Name: Caldera
GoodieHutType.Description: In the center of an ancient, worn crater stands a circle of huge stones, as wide around as a man, twice again as tall. Within that circle stands a creature whose body flickers with light.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Garrote
GoodieHutType.Description: The fabled Snow Ogre of Al-Axulla's Bestiary, though the monster appears to share its cave with something else.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wolves
GoodieHutType.Description: A pack of lean, dangerous-looking animals... intent on keeping all intruders far clear of their refuge.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ice Elemental Sanctum
GoodieHutType.Description: Ice crystals dance across surface of the frozen tundra... the world is still and silent.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wandering Steed
GoodieHutType.Description: This roan has the healthy, well-fed look of a nobleman's mount. From the way it moves, it is used to the saddle. Whoever abandoned this horse did so very recently... and quite likely not of their own free will.

GoodieHutType.Name: Rat-infested Ruin
GoodieHutType.Description: A pack of filthy rodents has made this abandoned house their home.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cobwebbed Ruin
GoodieHutType.Description: The house, somehow, still stands in the waste... perhaps because of the finger thick webs covering its every surface... webs that all at once begin to tremble as something from deep within the house approaches.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ruined Estate
GoodieHutType.Description: The fallen entrance door bears the faint remains of the sigil of House LaMord... one of the great merchant houses of the time before the Cataclysm. Treasure may yet wait within.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ruins
GoodieHutType.Description: Here stand the ruins of an ancient temple. All that remains is crumbled white stone, now home to the chittering creatures scurrying everywhere.

GoodieHutType.Name: Dragon Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: The charred bones of some beast of burden - a horse or camel, most likely - lie scattered across the rocky crag.

GoodieHutType.Name: Skeletons in the Swamp
GoodieHutType.Description: Here, amid the fetid decay of a grove of cypra trees, lie bones and broken stones... signposts to buried treasure... an explorer's graveyard... or perhaps, both.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ancient Tomb
GoodieHutType.Description: The awesome energies unleashed by the Cataclysm have brought an ancient structure to the surface... it looks like a tomb of some sort... though who - or what - lies within remains to be seen.

GoodieHutType.Name: Primitive Campground
GoodieHutType.Description: A bonfire... a series of simple lean-tos... the home of a barely civilized people.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman of the Wildings
GoodieHutType.Description: Within this cave dwells a wilding shaman... a witch-doctor of the Wilding people... powerful, and easily angered.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Forge
GoodieHutType.Description: A blacksmith's workshop... rusted tools lie nearby... as do several intact wooden chests.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Rift in the Sky
GoodieHutType.Description: A blackness without stars. A faint breeze carries with it the smell of another place... another time... perhaps another reality altogether.

GoodieHutType.Name: Bhinadmi Fissure
GoodieHutType.Description: A crack in the earth reveals an unfathomably deep hole... a world beneath the one we know, haunted by creatures more horrible and magnificant than anything that wanders on the world's surface.

GoodieHutType.Name: Air Elemental's Sanctum
GoodieHutType.Description: A circle of huge stones, the size and shape of a wagon’s flatbed, stand on edge in the clearing before you.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Air Shrills
GoodieHutType.Description: Here stand the ruins of an ancient temple... the runes long since worn off the exposed pillars and stone walls. All that remains is crumbled white stone... now home to the chittering creatures scurrying everywhere.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: There is an altar at the center of the ruined temple. On it you find an item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: There is an altar at the center of the ruined temple. On it you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Spider's Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: From the dimly-lit recesses of the cave, a pale white monster emerges. A reclusive, deadly creature, glowing from the tint of the phosphorescent cave moss rubbed off against its armor-like carapace.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the spiders den you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Spider's Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: From the dimly-lit recesses of the cave, a pale white monster emerges. A reclusive, deadly creature, glowing from the tint of the phosphorescent cave moss rubbed off against its armor-like carapace.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the spiders den you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lord of the Butchermen
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lives Amhah... cursed Padar of Red Spring, who sacrificed 10,000 of his people in a vain attempt to appease the Emperor Curgen.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: River of Ash
GoodieHutType.Description: A River of Ash leads to a hole in the mountainside... the ground here is broken and black, almost as if the land itself was cursed.

Treasure.Title: Dragon Lair
Treasure.Desc: These crags, the spines of the earth, are home to ancient creatures. The air echoes with their voices and the land resonates with the power of massive scaled claws on stone. Dragon will return to this place, as they have for centuries, if you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Demon's Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: The sounds of the forest fade, as a black, horned monster, steps forward on two legs from the shadows.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You interrupted the creatures last meal. Blood, bones and flesh are scattered like the toys of a demented child. Most of the victims possesions are destroyed, but you do find one item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Demon's Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: The sounds of the forest fade, as a black, horned monster, steps forward on two legs from the shadows.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You interrupted the creatures last meal. Blood, bones and flesh are scattered like the toys of a demented child. Most of the victims possesions are destroyed, but you do find one item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Bandits' Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A gathering of barely-civilized thieves. Their booty - lumber stolen from mills, bolts of cloth from passing caravans, racks of game taken from lone hunters - lies scattered around them.

Treasure.Title: Found treasure!
Treasure.Desc: The bandit's camp contains a sack of gold!

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the bandit's camp you find a rusty shield.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the bandit's camp you find some leather armor

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the bandit's goods are worthless, you do find a piece of leather armor that might be useful.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the bandit's goods are worthless, you do find a something that might come in handy.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Bandits' Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A gathering of barely-civilized thieves. Their booty - lumber stolen from mills, bolts of cloth from passing caravans, racks of game taken from lone hunters - lies scattered around them.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the bandit's camp you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Bandits' Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A gathering of barely-civilized thieves. Their booty - lumber stolen from mills, bolts of cloth from passing caravans, racks of game taken from lone hunters - lies scattered around them.

Treasure.Title: Mercenary Camp
Treasure.Desc: You can recruit Mercenaries from this location if you build a camp here.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Bandits' Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A gathering of barely-civilized thieves. Their booty - lumber stolen from mills, bolts of cloth from passing caravans, racks of game taken from lone hunters - lies scattered around them.

Treasure.Title: Mercenary Camp
Treasure.Desc: You can recruit Mercenaries from this location if you build a camp here.

GoodieHutType.Name: Signs of the Bear
GoodieHutType.Description: The shattered remnants of a honeycomb lie strewn across the mountain path, alongside the broken branches of a blackberry bush.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching through the dirt and leaves of the bear's den you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Signs of the Bear
GoodieHutType.Description: The shattered remnants of a honeycomb lie strewn across the mountain path, alongside the broken branches of a blackberry bush.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching through the dirt and leaves of the bear's den you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Widow Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Spun between two dead oaks in a field of ash, a web with threads as thick as rope holds the dessicated corpse of an unfortunate traveler.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The spider was nesting over what you first assume is a clutch of spider eggs. When you cut away the webbing you discover an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Widow Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Spun between two dead oaks in a field of ash, a web with threads as thick as rope holds the dessicated corpse of an unfortunate traveler.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The spider was nesting over what you first assume is a clutch of spider eggs. When you cut away the webbing you discover an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Monster's Refuge
GoodieHutType.Description: The landscape is ash. The sun beats down on a collection of rusted armor, broken weaponry, and torn bits of clothing. Nearby, skulls litter the ground, small enough to be those of children, or darkling warriors.

Treasure.Title: Ogre Camp
Treasure.Desc: A tribe of Ogres lives here. They are smaller than the ones you met in the wild, you assume they are female. Ogre young stare at you with large, black eyes. All have suffered at the hands of the brutal male Ogres and don't offer any resistance. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Monster's Refuge
GoodieHutType.Description: The landscape is ash. The sun beats down on a collection of rusted armor, broken weaponry, and torn bits of clothing. Nearby, skulls litter the ground, small enough to be those of children, or darkling warriors.

Treasure.Title: Ogre Camp
Treasure.Desc: A tribe of Ogres lives here. They are smaller than the ones you met in the wild, you assume they are female. Ogre young stare at you with large, black eyes. All have suffered at the hands of the brutal male Ogres and don't offer any resistance. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Well
GoodieHutType.Description: There is an old well here, but it is as dry and ruined as the creatures that hunt here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The butcherman kept a small pouch of items from his life, including an item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Well
GoodieHutType.Description: There is an old well here, but it is as dry and ruined as the creatures that hunt here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The butcherman kept a small pouch of items from his life, including an item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Well
GoodieHutType.Description: There is an old well here, but it is as dry and ruined as the creatures that hunt here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The butcherman kept a small pouch of items from his life, including an item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Well
GoodieHutType.Description: There is an old well here, but it is as dry and ruined as the creatures that hunt here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The butcherman kept a pouch of items from his life, including an item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave Bear Den
GoodieHutType.Description: Fallen trees... trampled brush.... All at once, an animal charges from the forest.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find an item buried in fragments of bones from the bears last victim.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave Bear Den
GoodieHutType.Description: Fallen trees... trampled brush.... All at once, an animal charges from the forest.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find an item buried in fragments of bones from the bears last victim.

GoodieHutType.Name: Dragon Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Tracks with claws the size of a warrior’s shield, lead forward into the darkness of a vast cavern.

Treasure.Title: Dragon Lair
Treasure.Desc: These crags, the spines of the earth, are home to ancient creatures. The air echoes with their voices and the land resonates with the power of massive scaled claws on stone. Dragon will return to this place, as they have for centuries, if you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Skath Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Egg shells litter the ground. The bones of goats, cows, horses, and men are buried in the sand, evidence of past meals that have been picked clean.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Desecrated Cemetery
GoodieHutType.Description: Graves lie uncovered; coffins lay in splinters around them. A single tomb looks over the defiled burial grounds, its door ripped open... inviting the curious - and the treasure seeker - to enter.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Desecrated Cemetery
GoodieHutType.Description: Graves lie uncovered; coffins lay in splinters around them. A single tomb looks over the defiled burial grounds, its door ripped open... inviting the curious - and the treasure seeker - to enter.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Broken Ground
GoodieHutType.Description: The ground is broken, as if corpses have pulled themselves out of the earth. But these creatures were never alive, it is the earth itself that has risen up.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Darkling Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A darkling lurker has setup a camp here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the darkling archer's equipment is unusable, you do find one item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Darkling Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A tribe of Darklings has setup a camp here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the darkling riders's equipment is unusable, you do find one item of value.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The camp is empty except for a dark warg you initially mistake for a corpse. He is nearly starved and shows considerable abuse from the darklings. When you offer him some of your provisions, he eagerly accepts.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The darkling had a small pouch of items he had collected; a squirrel tail, teeth and a letter from one of his victims.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman's Tent
GoodieHutType.Description: A single figure bows low before the flickering firelight, chanting softly to himself.

Treasure.Title: Darkling Camp
Treasure.Desc: A darkling tribe lives here. With their warriors defeated they cower before you. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit darkings to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman's Tent
GoodieHutType.Description: A single figure bows low before the flickering firelight, chanting softly to himself.

Treasure.Title: Darkling Camp
Treasure.Desc: A darkling tribe lives here. With their warriors defeated they cower before you. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit darkings to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Darkling Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A darkling warlock has setup a camp here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the darkling warlock's equipment is unusable, you do find one item in good condition.

GoodieHutType.Name: Darkling Altar
GoodieHutType.Description: A darkling warlock has setup a base here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the darkling warlock's equipment is unusable, you do find one item in good condition.

GoodieHutType.Name: Darkling Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A darkling warrior has setup a camp here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the darkling warrior's equipment is unusable, you do find one item in good condition.

GoodieHutType.Name: Dark Tower
GoodieHutType.Description: No animals hunt these lands, no birds fly over. An old tower stands sentry over the quiet land and somehow seems to be in shadow from every direction.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The tower is full of odd remains, bones and skins. Empty cages of all sizes were constructed to hold animals and the unnatural. Searching through the collection you find an item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Dark Tower
GoodieHutType.Description: No animals hunt these lands, no birds fly over. An old tower stands sentry over the quiet land and somehow seems to be in shadow from every direction.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The tower is full of odd remains, bones and skins. Empty cages of all sizes were constructed to hold animals and the unnatural. Searching through the collection you find an item of value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Death Demon Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: The stench of sorcery wafts from the cave nearby... a guttural noise, that will echo in your nightmares, comes out of it.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: A dark chest nearly the size of a coffin lies in the center of the clearing. Inside you find the remains of the last victim of the Death Demon, and an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Remnants of the Inferno
GoodieHutType.Description: The shattered columns of the charred and ruined buildings here bear the same inscription, over and over again, a single word, Annielum. This is a place of legend, where Delin, the Pyre of Man, was born.

GoodieHutType.Name: Darkened Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: From within comes the sound of an animal's cry.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Earth Elemental Sanctum
GoodieHutType.Description: Here stands a clearing, surrounded by a ring of dead trees. In the center of that ring, standing knee-deep in the deep, fetid loam of the forest, waits a creature out of legend.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Shrills
GoodieHutType.Description: Long before they can be seen, they are heard... shrills... the monstrous creatures said to have been created by Morrigan the mad, in the depths of N'it'vaganesh.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Landslide!
GoodieHutType.Description: A huge pile of boulders blocks the winding mountain path... though beyond the rocks, you can see the entrance to a cavern.

Treasure.Title: Dragon Lair
Treasure.Desc: These crags, the spines of the earth, are home to ancient creatures. The air echoes with their voices and the land resonates with the power of massive scaled claws on stone. Dragon will return to this place, as they have for centuries, if you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Caldera
GoodieHutType.Description: In the center of an ancient, worn crater stands a circle of huge stones, as wide around as a man, twice again as tall. Within that circle stands a creature whose body flickers with light.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Fire Shrill Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Fire Shrills dwell here... demonic creatures bred for no purpose other than the Titans' amusement.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Underbrush
GoodieHutType.Description: Movement in the underbrush... the sound of something large, tromping through the forest nearby. A lost horse... a wary traveler... or something else entirely.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Snow Ogre
GoodieHutType.Description: This is the home of a monstrous creature that is immune to cold... and quick to attack the unwary.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The creature wasn't a beast and kept a small collection of items that interested him or were useful. Among them you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Rock Spider's Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Before the cavern entrance lies a dessicated animal carcass, its skin burned away by venom as powerful as acid.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Within the spider's cavern you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Great Wolf Den
GoodieHutType.Description: This cave is home to a pack of hungry wolves.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Hidden amongst the stones you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Sunken Marsh
GoodieHutType.Description: Just inside a low-ceilinged, suffocatingly hot cavern... from somewhere within comes a soft, hissing sound.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Wrapped in tick infested blankets you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Hoarder Spider Nest
GoodieHutType.Description: This cave is home to the lord of the spider kingdom, a hoarder spider - largest and most powerful of Elemental's monstrous arachnids... and often found near artifacts of great power.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The floor of the hoarder spider's den is loose earth that looks to have been recently dug up by the spider. Digging through the earth you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Hoarder Spider Nest
GoodieHutType.Description: This cave is home to the lord of the spider kingdom, a hoarder spider - largest and most powerful of Elemental's monstrous arachnids... and often found near artifacts of great power.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The floor of the hoarder spider's den is loose earth that looks to have been recently dug up by the spider. Digging through the earth you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Frozen Sanctuary
GoodieHutType.Description: A stand of giant stalagmites, arranged in a circle, mark this as the home of an Ice Elemental.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Ignys
GoodieHutType.Description: These rocks are home to a pack of Ignys, flaming serpents who sometimes nest near fire shards.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The ground here is a mixture of ash, shattered, blackened bones and warped stones. All the remains of the Ignys's prior victims have been destroyed except for one item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ruins
GoodieHutType.Description: There was once a cage here large enough to hold a bear. But it is little more than ruins now.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Krigoth
GoodieHutType.Description: If you are close enough to recognize this for what it is, it is probably too late to flee.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Skath Den
GoodieHutType.Description: There are shallow trenches cut through the mud, evidence of the creatures that nest here.

GoodieHutType.Name: Mite Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: A hive of vile Mites plotting to wreak havok. Mites thrive in chaotic environments and rue the day that civilization returns to the world.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the camp you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Sunken Marsh
GoodieHutType.Description: Just inside a low-ceilinged, suffocatingly hot cavern... from somewhere within comes a soft, hissing sound.

GoodieHutType.Name: Mysterious Pit
GoodieHutType.Description: Just inside a low-ceilinged, suffocatingly hot cavern... from somewhere within comes a soft, hissing sound.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: Dim voices echo through this cave. It is impossible to tell if they are the sounds of some ancient civilization living beneath Namtur, all that remains of adventurers that have been lost within them, or whispers from a darker world.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: Dim voices echo through this cave. It is impossible to tell if they are the sounds of some ancient civilization living beneath Namtur, all that remains of adventurers that have been lost within them, or whispers from a darker world.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: Dim voices echo through this cave. It is impossible to tell if they are the sounds of some ancient civilization living beneath Namtur, all that remains of adventurers that have been lost within them, or whispers from a darker world.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: Dim voices echo through this cave. It is impossible to tell if they are the sounds of some ancient civilization living beneath Namtur, all that remains of adventurers that have been lost within them, or whispers from a darker world.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: Dim voices echo through this cave. It is impossible to tell if they are the sounds of some ancient civilization living beneath Namtur, all that remains of adventurers that have been lost within them, or whispers from a darker world.

GoodieHutType.Name: Stone Colossus
GoodieHutType.Description: A golem of black obsidian, the rarest of its kind, created in the final days before the Cataclysm... it awaits the champion who can master it.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Bloody Clearing
GoodieHutType.Description: A huge cow lies on the ground, literally ripped in half. The outline of a handprint – a hand the size of a man’s chest – is smeared in blood across the nearby rocks. From nearby comes the sound of chewing.

Treasure.Title: Ogre Refuge
Treasure.Desc: A tribe of Ogres lives here. They are smaller than the ones you met in the wild, you assume they are female. Ogre young stare at you with large, black eyes. All have suffered at the hands of the brutal male Ogres and don't offer any resistance. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Bloody Clearing
GoodieHutType.Description: A huge cow lies on the ground, literally ripped in half. The outline of a handprint – a hand the size of a man’s chest – is smeared in blood across the nearby rocks. From nearby comes the sound of chewing.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Crystal Crag
GoodieHutType.Description: An outcrop of glistening minerals, beyond which a dark cavern beckons.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Order of Asok
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lie the remnants of a vast temple complex thousands of years old, sanctuaries and houses of worship once devoted to the Five - the Elemental Lords of Anthuane, whose treasures may yet remain within.

Treasure.Title: Order of Asok
Treasure.Desc: After meeting with the heads of the order they agree to make their knights available to your service if you build a camp here. They also commit to keep their young knights from wandering out and terrorizing the surrounding lands.

GoodieHutType.Name: Mysterious Pit
GoodieHutType.Description: Just inside a low-ceilinged, suffocatingly hot cavern... from somewhere within comes a soft, hissing sound.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Ravager
GoodieHutType.Description: This is the home of a monstrous creature that is quick to attack the unwary.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The creature wasn't a beast and kept a small collection of items that interested him or were useful. Among them you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cobwebbed Ruin
GoodieHutType.Description: The house, somehow, still stands in the waste... perhaps because of the finger thick webs covering its every surface... webs that all at once begin to tremble as something from deep within the house approaches.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The spider made it's home in the houses cellar, within the layer of webbing and loose earth you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: River Slag's Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: From its bed of trampled river rushes, the monster begins to rise.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Dark Crevasse
GoodieHutType.Description: Something skitters forward... a spider the size of a warg... and then darts back into the blackness.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: A Dark Crevasse
GoodieHutType.Description: Something skitters forward... a spider the size of a warg... and then darts back into the blackness.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: An emaciated corpse has been half pulled into the spiders burrow. The corpse has little of value except for a single item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: A shriveled corpse lies in the spider nest. It has nothing of interest except for a small note.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ruffian Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A gathering of barely-civilized thieves. Their booty - lumber stolen from mills, bolts of cloth from passing caravans, racks of game taken from lone hunters - lies scattered around them.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: The Desert Wanderer
GoodieHutType.Description: Refuge of the Sand Golem - one of thousands created to battle in the last of the Great Wars... one of the few remaining in the wake of the Cataclysm.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Shrill Lord
GoodieHutType.Description: Refuge of this monstrous, spider-like creature, one of Morrigan's last - and deadliest - creations.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Den of the Silt Skath
GoodieHutType.Description: The great carpet of rushes along the riverbanks lie flattened, as if crushed by a great weight. In the middle of this clearing lies the half-chewed body of a crocodile... and the monstrous creature that killed it.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Slag Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Thrice the size of a man, with hide tougher than the hardest armor, the Slag towers over all other creatures of the marshland, who serve as its prey.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Spider Queen
GoodieHutType.Description: This cave is home to the lady of the spider kingdom, an Empress black widow spider - most dangerousof Elemental's monstrous arachnids... and often found near artifacts of great power.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The floor of the hoarder spider's den is loose earth that looks to have been recently dug up by the spider. Digging through the earth you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Panther Den
GoodieHutType.Description: This area is quiet and draped in shadow. No birds shriek, no rabbits scurry through the underbrush. Despite the quiet you can't help but feel like you are being watched.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Dragon Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: The charred bones of some beast of burden - a horse or camel, most likely - lie scattered across the rocky crag.

Treasure.Title: Dragon Lair
Treasure.Desc: These crags, the spines of the earth, are home to ancient creatures. The air echoes with their voices and the land resonates with the power of massive scaled claws on stone. Dragon will return to this place, as they have for centuries, if you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Syndicate Head Quarters
GoodieHutType.Description: This is home to the leaders of the criminal organization known as the Syndicate. From this position, the Syndicate directs their followers to ravage the countryside for money, resources and slaves.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the stronghold you find something... interesting.

GoodieHutType.Name: Syndicate Fortress
GoodieHutType.Description: This is home to the leaders of the criminal organization known as the Syndicate. From this position, the Syndicate directs their followers to ravage the countryside for money, resources and slaves.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the stronghold you find something... interesting.

GoodieHutType.Name: Syndicate Outpost
Syndicate Hideout
Syndicate Safe House
GoodieHutType.Description: This small outpost is a hive of criminal activity of the nefarious Syndicate. This organization preys on isolated settlements for food, gildar, and other resources.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The syndicate outpost contains a chest, within the chest you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Syndicate Stronghold
Syndicate Hive
Syndicate Base
GoodieHutType.Description: This is one of the headquarters for the criminal organization known as the Syndicate. They prey on the weak and isolated settlements across the land.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the stronghold you find something... interesting.

GoodieHutType.Name: Warg Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Timber Wargs don't stay in one place for long. There is little evidence that one has made this its home except the suspicious lack of rabbits or other game.

Treasure.Title: Found Gildar!
Treasure.Desc: Several gildar are scattered amongst the bones of the Timber Warg's past victims.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find the body of the warg's last victim. It has nothing of interest except for an old note.

GoodieHutType.Name: Primitive Campground
GoodieHutType.Description: A bonfire... a series of simple lean-tos... the home of a barely civilized people.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Stashed inside a crudely tanned deerskin bag you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman's Hut
GoodieHutType.Description: From the simple shack's chimney, smoke rises. Smoke of a brilliant, unearthly blue... the smoke of a channeler's fire.. Potions of some sort are being brewed.

Treasure.Title: Troll Lair
Treasure.Desc: A clan of trolls lives here. They are brutish and dimwitted, but with their warriors gone they offer no real resistance to you. They live in shallow pits covered by a loose collection of branches, vines and mud. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your service.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman's Hut
GoodieHutType.Description: From the simple shack's chimney, smoke rises. Smoke of a brilliant, unearthly blue... the smoke of a channeler's fire.. Potions of some sort are being brewed.

Treasure.Title: Troll Lair
Treasure.Desc: A clan of trolls lives here. They are brutish and dimwitted, but with their warriors gone they offer no real resistance to you. They live in shallow pits covered by a loose collection of branches, vines and mud. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your service.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman's Hut
GoodieHutType.Description: From the simple shack's chimney, smoke rises. Smoke of a brilliant, unearthly blue... the smoke of a channeler's fire.. Potions of some sort are being brewed.

Treasure.Title: Troll Lair
Treasure.Desc: A clan of trolls lives here. They are brutish and dimwitted, but with their warriors gone they offer no real resistance to you. They live in shallow pits covered by a loose collection of branches, vines and mud. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your service.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of Savages
GoodieHutType.Description: Bones litter the path leading up to the cave entrance... the guttural sounds of primitive speech, noises that barely qualify as language, come from within the darkened cavern.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Stashed inside a crudely tanned deerskin bag you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Umberdroth Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Dug from the rock and stone itself is a great cavern whose entrance is as large as a tall-masted merchant ship... whatever lives within is not to be trifled with.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find find an item that was lost by a prior explorer.

GoodieHutType.Name: Umberdroth Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Dug from the rock and stone itself is a great cavern whose entrance is as large as a tall-masted merchant ship... whatever lives within is not to be trifled with.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Searching the area you find find an item that was lost by a prior explorer.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lair of the Water Shrills
GoodieHutType.Description: This half-submerged cave is home to a pack of water shrills... easily-startled, and easily angered.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: At the bottom of a shallow pool you find an item. It is undamaged by the water.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wilding Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: This place is a favored camp by the nomadic Wilding warriors.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the Wilding camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you find a single item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The Wilding Warrior had a collection of small objects, a knucklebone, some beads and a letter.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wilding Hunting Grounds
GoodieHutType.Description: Wilidings are normally only found in the desert. These bold wildings have come into the grasslands in search for food

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the Wilding camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you find a single item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The Wilding Warrior had a collection of small objects, a knucklebone, some beads and a letter.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wilding Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: This place is a favored camp by the nomadic Wilding warriors.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the Wilding camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you find a single item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The Wilding Warrior had a collection of small objects, a knucklebone, some beads and a letter.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wilding Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: This place is a favored camp by the nomadic Wilding warriors.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the Wilding camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you find a single item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wilding Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: Wilidings are normally only found in the desert. These wildings have claimed these grasslands as their own

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the Wilding camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you find a single item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: There is an Umbran War Boar tied here. He is thin and emanciated. Though he violently paws the ground as you approach, when you offer him some food he chuffs happily.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wilding Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: This place is a favored camp by the nomadic Wilding warriors.

Treasure.Title: Wilding Village
Treasure.Desc: All of the wildings you have seen have been warriors of one type or another. But here you find their children and elderly living in simple, but well made, huts. They offer no resistance to you and seek only to continue to live in their small village. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Shaman of the Wildings
GoodieHutType.Description: Within this cave dwells a Bajinn... a witch-doctor of the Wilding people... powerful, and easily angered.

Treasure.Title: Wilding Village
Treasure.Desc: All of the wildings you have seen have been warriors of one type or another. But here you find their children and elderly living in simple, but well made, huts. They offer no resistance to you and seek only to continue to live in their small village. If you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wilding Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: This place is a favored camp by the nomadic Wilding warriors.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the Wilding camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you are only able to turn up one item of value.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The Wilding Warrior had a collection of small objects, a knucklebone, some beads and a letter.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wolf Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: A pack of lean, dangerous-looking animals... intent on keeping all intruders far clear of their refuge.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you are only able to turn up one useful item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ancient Battlefield
Lost Battleground
Old Battlefield
GoodieHutType.Description: The site of a long-forgotten battle from the time before this one, or perhaps a more recent struggle. Bits of bone dot the ground, though whether that bone belonged to man or fallen is difficult to tell.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: While walking through the debris of the ancient battle, you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Sun-Bleached Bones
A Monster's Bones
Beast's Remains
Monster's Remains
GoodieHutType.Description: The skeleton of a long dead creature lies in a heap on the ground. Scavengers have long since picked it clean.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find an item still in the hand of the skeleton who once owned it. You try not to think about what became of its owner.

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Caravan
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lie the wreckage of several wagons... splintered wood lies scattered across the ground... a few canvas bags can be seen as well... and there are, of course, several corpses.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find an item in the wagon's remains.

GoodieHutType.Name: Treasure Chest
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lies a crate of polished hardwood, a crate stamped in red ink with the seal of the Merchants Guild... a crate whose treasures wait to be revealed.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Inside the chest you find an item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Inside the chest you find a valuable item.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Inside the chest you find an item!

GoodieHutType.Name: Shattered Statue
GoodieHutType.Description: A shattered statue lies on the ground, a statue of Dariun the Founder, namesake of his line, first king of fabled Antheros, bearing the twin swords with which he vanquished the armies of the Quendar.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Beneath the feet of the once great warrior you find a shattered urn containing a dust covered potion.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: There was a faceted stone embedded in the chest of the statue, but it has since fallen loose.

Treasure.Title: Found a Scroll
Treasure.Desc: You find a scroll tucked in the broken pieces of the statue.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The remains of the statues weapon would make a crude mace.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: A runed token is inset in the statue, the one who owns the token can command the statue.

GoodieHutType.Name: Dark Spire
GoodieHutType.Description: This atrous tower draws in all light and appears black even against the starless night sky. It is like a bottomless pit that pulls you toward its dark walls and you can’t help but feel a tremor of unnatural fear as you draw close.

Treasure.Title: Found the Blood Curse spell
Treasure.Desc: The spire is unoccupied except for the withered remains of scribes, soldiers and aristocrats, along with the evidence of their depravity. In the highest tower you find a tome bound in flesh and written in blood. It contains a spell that makes the caster something not quite alive, immortal as long as there are those that can be sacrificed in his place.

GoodieHutType.Name: Skeleton
GoodieHutType.Description: A monster's skeleton lies in the dirt, its bones bleached white by the sun. This long-dead creature was easily thrice the size of a man, with teeth a foot long, and wings wider than a longship.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: In the shadow of the mighty beast's bones you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Equipment Cache
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lies a stack of crates bearing the insignia of the Free Riders, those fierce, unforgiving warriors who roam the wastelands, determined to bring order to chaos.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: A swift kick splinters the rotting wood crates. Hidden inside, you find a valuable item.

GoodieHutType.Name: An ancient graveyard
A desolate cemetery
GoodieHutType.Description: Tombstones, too many to count, stand guard over the long-dead denizens of this burial ground. There is the stench of sorcery in the air... and of forbidden treasure, waiting to be found.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find a valuable item laid out on a sarcophagus.

GoodieHutType.Name: Library of Illuna
GoodieHutType.Description: The runes above the entry door mark this building as a Lexicouros? a library from fabled Antheros... Within may lie the secrets of that vanished Empire's famed technological feats.

Treasure.Title: Found Ancient Texts
Treasure.Desc: Searching through the ruins you find several ancient texts that hold important knowledge from the past! (+100 research)

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find a magical item laid out on a sarcophagus.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wooden Crates
Lost Goods
Misplaced Wares
Forgotten Goods
GoodieHutType.Description: Crates lie beneath a handful of rotting tree limbs. They are coated by a thick layer of dust and crawling insects, who have staked a claim to whatever treasures these crates contain.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Most of what the crates contain has been ruined, except for a single item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Lost Library
GoodieHutType.Description: The runes above the entry door mark this building as a Lexicouros... a library from fabled Antheros... Within may lie the secrets of that vanished Empire's famed technological feats.

Treasure.Title: Found Ancient Texts
Treasure.Desc: Searching through the ruins you find several ancient texts that hold important knowledge from the past! (+20 research)

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned House
GoodieHutType.Description: An abandoned house, one of considerable size and grandeur... now overgrown and ruined.

Treasure.Title: Found Ancient Texts
Treasure.Desc: Searching through the ruined home you find a hidden compartment under a loose floor board. Inside you find several ancient texts that hold important knowledge from the past! (+10 research)

Treasure.Title: Found a book
Treasure.Desc: The old house is largely empty but you notice an old bookshelf still contains one book.

Treasure.Title: Found a book
Treasure.Desc: The old house is largely empty but you notice an old bookshelf still contains one book.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: This was once a laborer's house and it is full of ruined tools and equipment. You are about to give up the search when you find a backpack so light it nearly floats in the air.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: The home is full of ruined musical instruments and paintings. There is only one instrument that has escaped the passage of years, a silver flute.

GoodieHutType.Name: Scrap Pile
GoodieHutType.Description: The site of a long-forgotten battle from the time before this one, or perhaps a more recent struggle. Bits of bone dot the ground, though whether that bone belonged to man or fallen is difficult to tell.

Treasure.Title: Found Metal Cache
Treasure.Desc: You find some usable metal among the scraps. (+30 metal)

Treasure.Title: Found Metal Cache
Treasure.Desc: You find some usable metal among the scraps. (+60 metal)

GoodieHutType.Name: Scrap Pile
GoodieHutType.Description: The site of a long-forgotten battle from the time before this one, or perhaps a more recent struggle. Bits of bone dot the ground, though whether that bone belonged to man or fallen is difficult to tell.

Treasure.Title: Found Metal Cache
Treasure.Desc: You find some usable metal among the scraps. (+60 metal)

Treasure.Title: Found Metal Cache
Treasure.Desc: You find some usable metal among the scraps. (+100 metal)

Treasure.Title: Found Treasure!
Treasure.Desc: Within the scrap pile you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Scrap Pile
GoodieHutType.Description: The site of a long-forgotten battle from the time before this one, or perhaps a more recent struggle. Bits of bone dot the ground, though whether that bone belonged to man or fallen is difficult to tell.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Within the scrap pile you find a magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Scroll Cache
GoodieHutType.Description: A small wooden box, covered with worn and barely legible writing... the hasp is broken... the contents beckon.

Treasure.Title: Found a Book
Treasure.Desc: The pouch opens easily, and inside you find a dusty old book.

Treasure.Title: Item Discovered!
Treasure.Desc: The pouch opens easily, and inside you find a dusty old book.

Treasure.Title: Found a Spell
Treasure.Desc: You find an ancient tome. It contains the details for casting the Summoner's Boon spell.

GoodieHutType.Name: Fountain of Morian
GoodieHutType.Description: The ruins of a fountain built in honor of the Elemental Lord Morian... long-dry, long-abandoned.

Treasure.Title: Pool of the Addervein
Treasure.Desc: You sip from a forgotten pool that improves your health (+3 Hit Points).

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Deep within the tangle of vines you find a discarded magical item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Skeletons in the Swamp
GoodieHutType.Description: Here, amid the fetid decay of a grove of cypra trees, lie bones and broken stones... signposts to buried treasure... an explorer's graveyard... or perhaps, both.

Treasure.Title: Found Gildar!
Treasure.Desc: Several gildar are scattered amongst the bones of past adventurers. Noting their lack of need for you pocket the currency for yourself.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: One of the explorers was carrying a backpack. Inside you find an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Remnants of a Tomb
GoodieHutType.Description: Toppled columns, broken stones, an entrance so overgrown that only the boldest of adventurers will dare to enter.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: You find an item hidden within the vines.

GoodieHutType.Name: Desolate Hovel
GoodieHutType.Description: A hut of stick and straw that at first glance looks uninhabited... till from within comes the sound of chanting, low and insistent.

Treasure.Title: Witch's Brew
Treasure.Desc: The witch gives you a hearty drink that increases your hit points.
